title: Stagecoach
description: Beneath the aged canopy of the old road, the Stagecoach rumbles, a vessel helmed by the Caretaker, ferrying both fresh-faced heroes and vital supplies to the hamletâ€™s embrace.

title: Tavern
description: A bastion of respite, the Tavern's creaking doors open to tales of valor and sorrow, offering solace in the form of mirth and forgetfulness as heroes seek to escape the clutches of their burdens.

title: Abbey
description: Amidst the echo of hallowed hymns, the Abbey stands as a sanctuary for the spirit, welcoming those who seek to unburden their souls through prayer and contemplation, gifting tranquility and occasionally, divine insight.

title: Guild
description: In the hushed, strategy-laden halls of the Guild, heroes hone not only their martial prowess, but whatever way of fighting the eldritch horrors that suits them best.

title: Blacksmith
description: Forged in the embers of the Blacksmith's furnace, the clanging of hammer on anvil shapes the might of heroes, fortifying their resolve through steel and craftsmanship.

title: Town Square
description: The Town Square, overlooked by the large statue depicting the Ancestor, serves as the pulsing heart of the hamlet, from which all manner of enterprise and management unfold.

title: Nomad Wagon
description: The Nomad Wagon, laden with relics and oddities from lands afar, offers adventurers the chance to procure artifacts of curious workmanship.

title: Jewelry Stand
description: The Jewelry Stand, a trove under the careful watch of the Jeweler, eagerly appraises and purchases the cosmic fragments in trade for relics.
